title: 4 Simple Ways to Block a Phone Number or Contact on iPhone

steps.title: Open the Phone app.
steps.content: Open the Phone app. This looks like a white phone icon with a green background.

steps.title: Tap Recents.
steps.content: Tap Recents . It's a clock icon in the bottom left corner of the screen. [1] X Research source

steps.title: Tap i next to the number you want to block.
steps.content: Tap i next to the number you want to block. It's on the right side of the screen.

steps.title: Tap Block this Caller.
steps.content: Tap Block this Caller . This will be in red, at the very bottom of the page. [2] X Research source

steps.title: Tap Block Contact.
steps.content: Tap Block Contact . The phone number will be blocked on your iPhone. [3] X Research source

steps.title: Open the Messages app.
steps.content: Open the Messages app. This looks like a white chat bubble icon with a green background. Use this method to block a phone number that has messaged you.

steps.title: Tap a conversation.
steps.content: Tap a conversation. Use the conversation with the phone number you want to block. [4] X Research source

steps.title: Tap the contact photo.
steps.content: Tap the contact photo. In most cases, this will be a grey person icon. A pop-up menu will open.

steps.title: Tap info.
steps.content: Tap info . This will be located underneath the phone number, to the right. [5] X Research source

steps.title: Tap Block this Caller.
steps.content: Tap Block this Caller . This will be in red, at the very bottom of the page. [6] X Research source

steps.title: Tap Block Contact.
steps.content: Tap Block Contact . The phone number will be blocked on your iPhone. [7] X Research source

steps.title: Open the Settings app.
steps.content: Open the Settings app. This looks like a grey cog icon. [8] X Research source Make sure to update your iPhone . Use this method to block a phone number in your Contacts .

steps.title: Tap Phone.
steps.content: Tap Phone . You can find this in the middle of the page, underneath Voice Memos .

steps.title: Tap Blocked Contacts.
steps.content: Tap Blocked Contacts . This will be underneath Call Blocking & Identification . [9] X Research source

steps.title: Tap Add New….
steps.content: Tap Add New… . You can find this at the very bottom of the page. If you have many numbers blocked, you may need to scroll to find this option. [10] X Research source

steps.title: Tap the contact you want to block.
steps.content: Tap the contact you want to block. They will be added to the block list. To block another number, tap Add New… again and select a new contact. To unblock a number, tap Edit in the top-right corner → tap the red minus sign → tap Unblock .

steps.title: Open the Settings app.
steps.content: Open the Settings app. This looks like a grey cog icon. Use this method to unblock a phone number or a contact.

steps.title: Tap Phone.
steps.content: Tap Phone . You can find this in the middle of the page, underneath Voice Memos . [11] X Research source

steps.title: Tap Blocked Contacts.
steps.content: Tap Blocked Contacts . This will be underneath Call Blocking & Identification . [12] X Research source

steps.title: Tap Edit.
steps.content: Tap Edit . This is at the top-right corner. You'll see a list of all blocked numbers.

steps.title: Tap the red minus icon, then tap Unblock.
steps.content: Tap the red minus icon, then tap Unblock . The phone number will be unblocked on your iPhone. The phone number will be able to call and send messages to your iPhone.
